kizuna_botan_d_02:
Welcome to my classroom. All the students here
are in the STEM track, just like me.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_03:
So, uh...there’s something I wanna talk to
you about.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_04:
But not here. Let’s go somewhere we can talk
in private.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_05: Th-this is my room. Make yourself at home.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_select_01: It’s nice and cozy in here
kizuna_botan_d_06:
Hehe. I know, right? Being surrounded by my
Veevees and figurines is my kinda heaven![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_07:
Wait, seriously? Is it the boxes from all my online
orders? Maybe I oughta get rid of ’em, huh...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_08:
Anyway, you must be wondering why I brought
you here. It’s about my Team Star friends.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_09:
They...they really mean the world to me. I love
them all so much that I got scared they weren’t\r
gonna fit in OK or be happy at school.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_10:
That’s why I’ve been sorta spying on them since
they came back.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_11:
But it turns out I didn’t need to worry.
They’re already having a great time![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_12:
And now I feel bad that I didn’t have it in me to
believe in them in the first place...[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_13:
They’ve all grown so much, but I haven’t changed
since Operation Starfall.\c
I’m still scheming up ways to fix things by myself
instead of having a little faith.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_select_04: You just need to believe in them!
kizuna_botan_d_14a:
Y-you really think so? That’s a normal thing for
friends to do?[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_14b:
Y-yeah. I know. I promise I’ll try, but it might take
me a little while to get there.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_15:
Huh... I feel better after talking it out with you,
[trnm:0]. Thanks.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_16:
And, um, I want you to know you’re a really
important friend to me, too.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_17a:
That goes for Nemona as well! And even Arven
and Koraidon![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_17b:
That goes for Nemona as well! And even Arven
and Miraidon![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_18:
You know, I don’t normally like having people in
my room.[npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_19:
But you’re an exception. Stop by for a chat
or whatever anytime![npcn:8]
kizuna_botan_d_20: Till our next confab, then! Hasta la vistar! ☆[npcn:8]
